item.title: C-Minor
item.description: [[songs/c/counterparts/the_difference_between_hell_and_home/debris.md#everything-ends-at-least-thats-what-we-hope-for-vyl-wnanory|Our house wrapped in disrepair,]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_difference_between_hell_and_home/debris.md#everything-ends-at-least-thats-what-we-hope-for-vyl-wnanory|A small mouse peeked out from a hole beneath the stairs]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_difference_between_hell_and_home/debris.md#everything-ends-at-least-thats-what-we-hope-for-vyl-wnanory|nearby to where my dad sat in his favorite chair,]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_difference_between_hell_and_home/debris.

item.title: January 1979
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|January, 1979.]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|Saw a terrible crash and i couldn’t help but laugh,]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/mercy.md#my-facade-made-of-stone-im-deep-beneath-now-i-need-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|As my ear pressed against the past like a glass on a wall of a house in a photograph.
